para:
When enabled, the following is in effect:
players spawn as &soldier; with a panzerfaust, a knife and 100 grenades • panzerfaust shoots faster • soldier charge recharges faster • soldier runs faster • panzer ammo is not consumed (infinite shots) • panzer damage is reduced to 33% of original amount • panzer splash damage radius is 67% of its original amount

para.note: This is a fun game mode and as such, it may not be compatible with the objectives of most maps.
